smul_def:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `direct_sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `direct_sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `direct_sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `direct_sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/

@[simp]
theorem smul_def [DecidableEq ι] [GMonoid A] [gmodule A M]
    (x : direct_sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `direct_sum" (A i))
    (y : direct_sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `direct_sum" (M i)) :
    «expr • » x y = smul_add_monoid_hom _ _ x y :=
  rfl
#align smul_def smul_def
smul_add_monoid_hom_apply_of_of:
@[simp]
theorem smul_add_monoid_hom_apply_of_of [DecidableEq ι] [GMonoid A] [gmodule A M] {i j} (x : A i) (y : M j) :
    smul_add_monoid_hom A M (DirectSum.of A i x) (of M j y) = of M (i + j) (ghas_smul.smul x y) := by
  simp [smul_add_monoid_hom]
#align smul_add_monoid_hom_apply_of_of smul_add_monoid_hom_apply_of_of
one_smul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `direct_sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `direct_sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `direct_sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `direct_sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `direct_sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `direct_sum -/
#print one_smul /-
-- Almost identical to the proof of `direct_sum.one_mul`
private theorem one_smul [DecidableEq ι] [GMonoid A] [gmodule A M]
    (x : direct_sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `direct_sum" (M i)) :
    «expr • »
        (1 : direct_sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `direct_sum" (A i)) x =
      x :=
  by
  suffices
    smul_add_monoid_hom A M 1 =
      AddMonoidHom.id
        (direct_sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `direct_sum" (M i))
    from AddMonoidHom.congr_fun this x
  apply DirectSum.addHom_ext; intro i xi
  unfold has_one.one
  rw [smul_add_monoid_hom_apply_of_of]
  exact direct_sum.of_eq_of_graded_monoid_eq (one_smul (GradedMonoid A) <| GradedMonoid.mk i xi)
#align one_smul one_smul
-/
of_smul_of:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
@[simp]
theorem of_smul_of [DecidableEq ι] [GMonoid A] [gmodule A M] {i j} (x : A i) (y : M j) :
    «expr • » (DirectSum.of A i x) (of M j y) = of M (i + j) (ghas_smul.smul x y) :=
  smul_add_monoid_hom_apply_of_of _ _ _ _
#align of_smul_of of_smul_of
mul_smul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `direct_sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `direct_sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `direct_sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `direct_sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
-- Almost identical to the proof of `direct_sum.mul_assoc`
private theorem mul_smul [DecidableEq ι] [gsemiring A] [gmodule A M]
    (a b : direct_sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `direct_sum" (A i))
    (c : direct_sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `direct_sum" (M i)) :
    «expr • » (a * b) c = «expr • » a («expr • » b c) :=
  by
  suffices
    (-- `λ a b c, (a * b) • c` as a bundled hom
              smul_add_monoid_hom
              A M).comp_hom.comp
        (direct_sum.mul_hom A) =
      (AddMonoidHom.compHom AddMonoidHom.flipHom <|
          (smul_add_monoid_hom A M).flip.comp_hom.comp <| smul_add_monoid_hom A M).flip
    from-- `λ a b c, a • (b • c)` as a bundled hom
      AddMonoidHom.congr_fun
      (AddMonoidHom.congr_fun (AddMonoidHom.congr_fun this a) b) c
  ext (ai ax bi bx ci cx) : 6
  dsimp only [coe_comp, Function.comp_apply, comp_hom_apply_apply, flip_apply, flip_hom_apply]
  rw [smul_add_monoid_hom_apply_of_of, smul_add_monoid_hom_apply_of_of, direct_sum.mul_hom_of_of,
    smul_add_monoid_hom_apply_of_of]
  exact
    direct_sum.of_eq_of_graded_monoid_eq
      (mul_smul (GradedMonoid.mk ai ax) (GradedMonoid.mk bi bx) (GradedMonoid.mk ci cx))
#align mul_smul mul_smul
